127.0.0.1:6379> MSET 127.0.0.2 0 127.0.0.3 0 127.0.0.4 0
OK
127.0.0.1:6379> MGET 127.0.0.2 127.0.0.3 127.0.0.4
1) "0"
2) "0"
3) "0"
127.0.0.1:6379> INCR 127.0.0.2
(integer) 1
127.0.0.1:6379> MGET 127.0.0.2 127.0.0.3 127.0.0.4
1) "1"
2) "0"
3) "0"
127.0.0.1:6379> INCR 127.0.0.4
(integer) 1
127.0.0.1:6379> INCR 127.0.0.4
(integer) 2
127.0.0.1:6379> MGET 127.0.0.2 127.0.0.3 127.0.0.4
1) "1"
2) "0"
3) "2"
127.0.0.1:6379>
